name: Article
description: Write engaging articles and blog posts
prompt: Create a well-structured article or blog post HTML document. Include a compelling headline, introduction, body sections with subheadings, and a conclusion. Use proper typography and spacing for comfortable reading. Add pull quotes or highlights for key points.
systemPrompt: You are a skilled content writer and editor. Transform the content into an engaging article with a strong narrative flow, clear structure, and reader-friendly formatting. Focus on readability and visual appeal.

example.title: Article Title
example.subtitle: A compelling subtitle that draws readers in
example.author: Author Name

sections.content: Hook the reader with an engaging opening

sections.text: A memorable quote that emphasizes a key point

htmlTemplate:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>{{title}}</title>
    <style>
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        body {
            font-family: Georgia, 'Times New Roman', serif;
            line-height: 1.8;
            color: #1a1a1a;
            background-color: #fff;
            padding: 40px 20px;
        }
        
        .article {
            max-width: 700px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        
        .article-header {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 50px;
        }
        
        h1 {
            font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
            font-size: 2.5em;
            font-weight: 700;
            line-height: 1.2;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            color: #1a1a1a;
        }
        
        .subtitle {
            font-size: 1.3em;
            color: #666;
            font-style: italic;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        .article-meta {
            font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            color: #999;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        
        .author {
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #666;
        }
        
        .lead {
            font-size: 1.2em;
            line-height: 1.6;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            font-weight: 300;
        }
        
        h2 {
            font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
            font-size: 1.8em;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-top: 40px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            color: #1a1a1a;
        }
        
        h3 {
            font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
            font-size: 1.3em;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-top: 30px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            color: #333;
        }
        
        p {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            text-align: justify;
            hyphens: auto;
        }

            font-size: 1.5em;
            line-height: 1.4;
            color: #e74c3c;

            border-top: 3px solid #f0f0f0;
            border-bottom: 3px solid #f0f0f0;
            text-align: center;
            font-style: italic;
        }
